easyStandard.cultist: Reveal another token. If you fail, after this skill test, discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until a location is discarded. Put that location into play and move there.
easyStandard.tablet: -3. If Yog-Sothoth is in play, it attacks you after this skill test.
easyStandard.elderSign: -X. X is the shroud value of your location. If you fail and your location is _Extradimensional_, discard it.

hardExpert.cultist: Reveal another token. After this skill test, discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until a location is discarded. Put that location into play and move there.
hardExpert.tablet: -5. If Yog-Sothoth is in play, it attacks you after this skill test.
hardExpert.elderSign: -X. X is twice the shroud value of your location. If you fail and your location is _Extradimensional_, discard it.
